cause.description:
Lupus is a potentially devastating disease which needs more funding!
GO HERE FOR INFO ON SF WALK: http://walk.lupusresearch.org/site/TR?fr_id=1660&pg=entry
AND go here to JOiN MY TEAM: http://walk.lupusresearch.org/site/TR?px=1344454&pg=personal&fr_id=1660
This is a MUST-SEE if you want to know about Lupus: http://youtube.com/watch?v=rC71qpgf2mc
1. Lupus is a disease that devastates approximately 1.5 million people in the US.
2. 9/10 lupus patients are women, 3/4 are people of color (Asian, Hispanic, African-American), making 68% of them women of color
cause.name: Walk With Us to Cure Lupus (SF walk)
